name: smite
description: Zero-debt engineering with unified development workflow. Features 3-plugin architecture (core, studio, essentials) with 4-flag composable system, semantic search with 75% token savings, and parallel execution (2-3x speedup).

metadata.description: SMITE v1.5.0 - Unified 4-flag architecture with 3-plugin system. Core infrastructure + Studio (complete dev workflow) + Essentials (productivity tools).

plugins.name: core
plugins.description: Shared utilities, templates, and validation schemas for all SMITE plugins. Includes platform detection, cross-platform utilities, and parallel execution infrastructure.

plugins.name: studio
plugins.description: Complete development workflow - explore, architect, build, refactor. Unified command namespace with 4 exploration modes, architecture design with creative workflow, 4-flag implementation system (speed, scale, quality, team), and systematic refactoring. Merged from agents, implement, explore, refactor.

plugins.name: essentials
plugins.description: Productivity utilities - automatic session renaming and cross-platform shell aliases (cc, ccc). Smart session naming based on context with customizable triggers and filters. Merged from shell and auto-rename.
